member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC
member.summary: Describes a graphics pipeline state object.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.pRootSignature
member.summary: A pointer to the object.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.VS
member.summary: A structure that describes the vertex shader.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.PS
member.summary: A structure that describes the pixel shader.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.DS
member.summary: A structure that describes the domain shader.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.HS
member.summary: A structure that describes the hull shader.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.GS
member.summary: A structure that describes the geometry shader.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.StreamOutput
member.summary: A structure that describes a streaming output buffer.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.BlendState
member.summary: A structure that describes the blend state.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.SampleMask
member.summary: The sample mask for the blend state.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.RasterizerState
member.summary: A structure that describes the rasterizer state.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.DepthStencilState
member.summary: A structure that describes the depth-stencil state.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.InputLayout
member.summary: A structure that describes the input-buffer data for the input-assembler stage.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.IBStripCutValue
member.summary: Specifies the properties of the index buffer in a structure.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.PrimitiveTopologyType
member.summary: A -typed value for the type of primitive, and ordering of the primitive data.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.NumRenderTargets
member.summary: The number of render target formats in the RTVFormats member.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.RTVFormats
member.summary: An array of -typed values for the render target formats.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.DSVFormat
member.summary: A -typed value for the depth-stencil format.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.SampleDesc
member.summary: A structure that specifies multisampling parameters.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.NodeMask
member.summary: For single GPU operation, set this to zero. If there are multiple GPU nodes, set bits to identify the nodes (the device's physical adapters) for which the graphics pipeline state is to apply. Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Refer to Multi-adapter systems.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.CachedPSO
member.summary: A cached pipeline state object, as a structure. pCachedBlob and CachedBlobSizeInBytes may be set to NULL and 0 respectively.

member.name: D3D12_GRAPHICS_PIPELINE_STATE_DESC.Flags
member.summary: A enumeration constant such as for "tool debug".
